questions.question: You are a student with an A1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 30 words. Describe your family.

answers.answer: I have a large family with four siblings, including me. My parents are hardworking and supportive. My elder sister is a doctor and my elder brother is an engineer. I have two younger sisters, who are studying in school. We enjoy spending time together.
